name: uDraw Studio
summary:
Discover your inner artist with uDraw Studio. Utilizing the uDraw GameTablet, players can finally express their own individual artistic creativity on Wii. Featuring versatile and easy-to-use tools, users can paint, draw, and color anything from simple doodles to intricate masterpieces. uDraw Studio offers the freedom to create spectacular works of art without the hassle of clean-up. 
 
uDraw Studio comes bundled with the uDraw GameTablet, which provides a unique and fun way for kids and families to play on Wii. With innovative features that allow kids to express themselves and bring their imaginations to life, the uDraw GameTablet creates an all-new category of play through an easy-to-use system.

name: uDraw Pictionary
summary:
uDraw Pictionary is an art-based video game developed by Page 44 Studios and published by THQ Inc. that players can play on the uDraw GameTablet for the Nintendo Wii. The game is based on the popular board game Pictionary, in which players draw pictures based on clues from a subject and have their teammates guess what specific words the picture is supposed to represent. It was released on November 14, 2010 for the Nintendo Wii game system.

Designed as a multi-player game or party game for all ages, players can choose teams of up to four people to play. Since the uDraw GameTablet comes bundled with uDraw Studio, another art-based video game, players can familiarize themselves with how the tablet and stylus pen work before playing, as well as how to draw, color and sketch on the tablet. uDraw Pictionary includes more than 3,000 clues, with traditional Adult Clues like Object, Difficult and Action or Junior Clues like “Animal Houses” and “At the Zoo” for younger players. The game differs somewhat from classic Pictionary, as the video game has new draw modes. The normal Pictionary mode lets users play the game show-style on a 3D game board with a variety of drawing tools, brushes and colors to choose from for a livelier sketching experience. Pictionary Mania has a custom game board and seven new draw modes, including Get It Straight, Shape It Up, Rotation Frustration, One Line, Ink Limit, No Peeking and Off Hand. Free Draw lets players use the drawing tools in the uDraw GameTablet to create works of art.

name: UDraw: Dood's Big Adventure
summary: Welcome to Dood’s Big Adventure! Using the power of the uDraw GameTablet players can draw, tilt and maneuver their way through 60 different fun and challenging levels. Customize Dood to roll, float and bounce through challenges by solving drawing related puzzles, collecting coins and defeating enemies in a world created by the user. Players construct not only the hero, but other objects and tools in the game by using drawing skills. Creativity and problem solving skills are the key to victory in Dood’s Big Adventure.

name: Udos sagner: Sveakampen
summary: Sveakampen is a Swedish action game which takes place in medieval times, released for PC in 2001. The game is based on the book Sveakampen.

name: Udderly Tickets
summary: Arcade game where people milk a fake cow for tickets.

name: uDraw Studio: Instant Artist
summary: Discover your inner artist with the uDraw Studio: Instant Artist, and express your creativity utilizing the ultimate, easy-to-use and easy-to-learn art creation experience.

name: uDodge:Practice Tool
summary: uDodge is a mini practice tool in which players get to polish and improve their mouse clicking as well as their reaction time.

name: Uden at prale - det er Harry
summary: A game featuring Harry, a puppet character from television commercials for DSB, a Danish railway company.

name: Udongein X
summary: Help Reisen Udongein Inaba navigate through 14 action packed stages in this exhilarating 2D Bullet Hell Platformer based on Touhou Project!

name: Udom Nebdon
summary: Udom Nebdon is a short fixed camera adventure horror-themed game.

name: Uda Game
summary: Explore the unknown dungeons full of treasure, doors and rooms. But keep in mind the creatures guards this place.

name: UdoRin
summary: A doujin game by YuuYuutei based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Udongein X: Seiran
summary: Add Seiran as a playable character to Udongein X, along with her own story.

name: UDO
summary: UDO is a delicious arcade down-scroller roguelike where you dig into a creepy hole with an oversized drill!

name: Udoiana Raunes
summary: An old parody of the Indiana Jones Point and Click games.

name: UD Cave
summary:
UD Cave is a fast-paced one-button game.

Your screen is split in halves with a cave in each half. You control two characters simultaneously going through the caves on each side. The cave on the right is upside down. Press a button to make both characters go right. Collect coins on the way to score points.

The game is over when either of the two characters hits the sides of the cave.

name: U.D.E. No.124 Tokyo Ghost Village
summary: A hardcore real-time strategy and first-person shooter from "727 Not Hound" in Japanese, on Steam in 2023.

name: Udongein X2
summary: Reisen is now cordially invited to Hell!

name: UDLR_Modify
summary:
To reach your goal, you must change yourself.

This game can be difficult, but the difficulty curve dips down every time a new mechanic is introduced. If you get stuck, don't be afraid to skip ahead - there is no penalty for doing so! Progress is saved as long as you have third-party cookies enabled.

name: Udder
summary: Reach escape velocity as a cow with no legs in this tiny reflexive one-button endless runner.

name: Udon! Road to Mastery
summary:
Firm noodles! Dashi! Tempura!
Fill udon orders as quickly as possible and follow the road to mastery!
